short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record and loop your camera in google meet and microsoft teams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to have a short break without turning off your camera?
why not loop your camera for 2 minutes and maintaining a virtual presence while taking short breaks during meetings.

In a 2021 report in the Journal of Applied Psychology, researchers who monitored 103 virtual workers' fatigue during meetings found that when workers used their camera (versus having it turned off), they were less engaged during meetings that day and the one after as well however, in many meetings, it does not have a good sign to turn off your camera, people might think you are not there and you have left your place.

To hear better and have better attention on conversation, isn't it sometimes better to close your eyes, to focus on words, to use your imagination without giving facial expression? 

Ever wanted to grab a drink or have a quick bite during an online meeting without turning off your camera? Now you can! 
Our extension lets you keep your camera on while taking breaks by displaying a looped video feed, giving the appearance of continuous engagement.

Stay engaged without concerning about how you are looking and which reaction you should bring on your face, all while you comfortably take a moment to relax or increase productivity by multitasking. 

This extension redefines meeting dynamics, allowing you to sip your favorite beverage, enjoy your lunch, or briefly step away without missing a beat. Enhance your Google Meet experience by effortlessly balancing personal needs with a continuous virtual presence.

Empower yourself with control over your virtual participation. With the 'Cameloop' extension, seamlessly blend your personal comfort with professional engagement, all while keeping your camera on.

Try it today and elevate your meeting sessions to a whole new level of convenience, privacy, and virtual presence!

Tipps:
while you do the loop, be more focus of the discussion and as soon as you need to participate, resume your real camera. So do NOT leave your desk.
